name: Matthew Evans
title: Full Stack Software Engineer
careerObjective: Results-driven Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience in enterprise safety-critical software development across diverse sectors including Healthcare, Military, Government, Aviation, and Education. Skilled in full-stack development with expertise in C#/.NET, SQL Server, Angular, TypeScript and web services APIs. Seeking to leverage expertise in software development, microservices architecture, and agile methodologies to tackle challenging projects in the U.S. tech industry.

workExperience.title: Full Stack Software Engineer / Team Lead
responsibilities: Developed and maintained applications using C#, JavaScript, Angular, Bootstrap, and CSS within an Agile environment.
Designed and implemented new microservices and APIs, adhering to SOLID principles.
Acted as a Scrum Master, ensuring adherence to Agile principles and facilitating sprint ceremonies.
Managed deployment processes using TeamCity and Octopus Deploy, ensuring minimal downtime.
Maintained and improved automation for build and deploy process.
Built and refined new SQL stored procedures and queries within Microsoft SQL Server.
Conducted and received peer reviews for code quality assurance across multiple scrum teams.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to prioritize support tasks and streamline development workflows.
Led a cross-functional software development team in Agile practices, including sprint planning, backlog planning, and daily stand-ups.
Facilitated effective communication and collaboration among team members to ensure alignment with project goals and priorities.
Collaborated with product owners, managers, and stakeholders to prioritize tasks and address project risks.
Created, maintained, and updated all documentation.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer in Test
responsibilities: Team leading and mentoring five apprentices in development and DevOps using C# best practices.
Head of test repositories.
Facilitated agile ceremonies including daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, retrospectives, and 1-to-1 meetings.
Developed ASP.NET Core web services and middleware for SOAP and RESTful API services.
Created and maintained Azure DevOps Build and release pipelines for continuous integration and continuous deployment.
Integrated automation test cases and unit tests into release pipelines.
Developed logic apps and power automate (flow) scripts with access through API management.
Peer reviewed junior software developers.
Automated testing using Selenium (C#), xUnit, Postman, and SoapUI.
Met with customers and system users to understand the scope of projects.
Created Test plans, Reports, suites, and defect Reports, estimating resources needed.
Provided technical assistance and guidance for Docker, Linux, and SQL.

workExperience.title: QA Engineer
responsibilities: Trained and mentored members of the testing team.
Estimated testing resources needed across multiple projects.
Analyzed and reviewed technical and non-technical documentation.
Created and documented test plans, test scenarios, test cases, and test reports.
Created and set up automation test software and suites using Selenium, Ranorex, and NUnit.
Produced standard operating procedures for automation testing.
Conducted data and database testing using SQL.

workExperience.title: Development Support Specialist
responsibilities: Provided technical support to development team members, including engineers, testers, and application operations.
Set up and maintained a development environment, ensuring availability and reliability for team members.
Collaborated with engineers to troubleshoot hardware and software issues.
Executed manual test cases, assisted in user acceptance testing, and maintained test environments.
Worked with application operations to deploy and maintain software applications in production environments.
Participated in cross-functional team meetings and contributed to continuous improvement initiatives.

educationAndQualifications.institution: BCS - The Chartered Institute for IT

projects.title: AI-Driven Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven chatbot using Python and TensorFlow, capable of handling customer inquiries and providing real-time support.

projects.title: E-Commerce store
projects.description: Built a scalable e-commerce platform with ASP.NET Core and Angular, featuring user authentication, product management, and payment integration.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.description: Created a weather forecast app using React and OpenWeather API, providing real-time weather updates and forecasts.
